channel.title: Slayer Monsters - if they die you get slayer EXP
channel.description:
How would you code this? If you kill a slayer monster (that you would find in the slayer tower) apply slayer exp depending on their level.
Like addSkillXP(5000*NPC[i].Level) or whatever....
Would you please tell me how to do it?
Skeleton - LVL 22 Basilisk - LVL 61 Jelly - Level 78 Turoth - VLV 86 Dust Devil - LVL 93 Nechryael - LVL 115 Abyssal Demon - 124 Dark Beast - 139
Not Completely sure of their npcIDS - but I guess just bind all of them....
THANK YOU!

item.title: Slayer Monsters - if they die you get slayer EXP

item.description:
@rnc505 wrote:

How would you code this? If you kill a slayer monster (that you would find in the slayer tower) apply slayer exp depending on their level.

Like addSkillXP(5000*NPC[i].Level) or whatever…
